articles.author: TOI Photogallery
articles.title: Nora Fatehi turns up the heat in a red latex gown - photogallery.indiatimes.com
articles.description: Nora Fatehi commands attention as she stuns in a ravishing latex red gown at an awards event.
articles.content: For her glam look, Nora opted for radiant makeup, featuring shimmer eyeshadow, mascara-coated lashes, contoured cheeks, a nude lipstick shade and left her hair loose with curls.
